about_the_game:
Nightmare Tale - Dive into dark stories where your decisions shape the nightmarish pages of this unique pixelated horror novel.

Gameplay:

Your character, Tom, inherits a mysterious hotel in the town of Redwater. Over the course of a week, he must decide the fate of the place, but each night proves to be much darker and more dangerous than the day.

Day Repair: The player spends his days exploring the hotel, solving puzzles, and rebuilding destroyed rooms. Each repair brings new details to the hotel's history.

Nightmares: When night falls, the hotel is transformed into a sinister maze with threats lurking in the darkness. The player controls the light - flashlight and lamp - to uncover secrets and avoid monsters.

Lighting and Vulnerability: Each light source brings its own benefit and protection, but they also have their own drawbacks that nightmares are sure to try to take advantage of.

Plot and Mysteries: As Tom progresses in his repairs and research at night, he uncovers dark secrets of the hotel and its past. All decisions and discoveries affect the progression of the story.

Live a week in Nightmare Tale, weighing every choice, and watch your story unfold in this engaging and interactive pixel novel.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10/7/8/8.1/XP/Vista (32 or 64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.4ghz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 260 GTS or Radeon HD 4850 - 512 MB of VRAM or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10/7/8/8.1 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2.66GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 460 GTX / Radeon 5770 - 1 GB of VRAM or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Nightmare Tale is an interactive horror novel with dark secrets and intricate puzzles. Take control of the fate of the main character named Tom, who inherited an old hotel. You will have to keep your sanity while discovering the horrifying secrets of the hotel.
